translation.en: It looks like you've got around...
40 cases.
And several full French oak barrels, so...
translation.it: e varie botti di rovere francese piene, quindi…

translation.en: My number's on the bottom.
If you're happy with the price, give me a call.
translation.it: Se il prezzo va bene, mi chiami.

translation.en: Oh, and the monthly lease payment, plus your commission on the sales should be around at least half of that each month.
translation.it: L'affitto più la commissione sulle vendite sarà circa la metà di questo, ogni mese.

translation.en: What do you think, Ms. Bernet?
Mom.
What?
-We did it. -What's this?
Oh, my gosh! Oh, honey!
Oh, my gosh! Oh!
Oh, I'm so proud of you. I love you so much.
translation.it: Sono così fiera di te. Ti voglio tanto bene.

translation.en: No way. That's the latest system.
translation.it: Non ci credo. È l'ultimo modello.

translation.en: Special limited edition.
Okay.
Don't get emotional.
Look, I'm sorry, mom, but this was the right thing to do.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, mamma, ma era la cosa giusta da fare.

translation.en: I know it's bad for business, bad for the company, but I had to do it.
translation.it: So che è un danno per l'azienda, ma dovevo farlo.

translation.en: I just-- I've never seen you so passionate about,
translation.it: Non avevi mai messo tanta passione… beh, in niente.

translation.en: -well, anything... -There's nothing you can say
translation.it: Non avevi mai messo tanta passione… beh, in niente. Non riuscirai a farmi cambiare idea,

translation.en: -to convince me otherwise-- -Joseph...
translation.it: Non riuscirai a farmi cambiare idea,

translation.en: -Because I finally understand-- -Joseph!
I'm actually proud of you.
Mom?
For what it's worth,
the position is still yours if you want it.
translation.it: il posto è ancora tuo, se lo vuoi.

translation.en: Thanks, but...
I think I'm good.
Okay, do you how many guests we have on the list?
translation.it: Ok, sapete quanti ospiti abbiamo sulla lista?

translation.en: Because last year we didn't have enough brownies,
translation.it: L'anno scorso non c'erano abbastanza brownie, è stato…

translation.en: and it was-- What is going on here?
translation.it: L'anno scorso non c'erano abbastanza brownie, è stato… Che sta succedendo qui?

translation.en: -Nothing. -Nothing.
Well, we just...
We just thought maybe we'd have the Christmas party
translation.it: abbiamo pensato di fare la festa di Natale

translation.en: in the old-- in the old dairy barn this year.
Are you kidding me? That place is a wreck.
translation.it: State scherzando? Quel posto è un disastro.

translation.en: Tell me right now.
Well... why don't we just show you?
Go on.
Mom!
Oh, it's so magical, isn't it?
I don't know what to say.
How-how did you do this?
I didn't.
I helped a little bit.
Give him a chance, okay?
Oh, my goodness.
Clever shirt.
-Saves on the small talk. -Yeah.
translation.it: È TARDI PER LE SCUSE? - Risparmio sul discorso. - Già.

translation.en: Okay, until you get your shotgun, I think I have at least a few minutes.
translation.it: Ok. Dammi due minuti, prima di andare a prendere il fucile.

translation.en: Better make it good then.
All right, um, listen, Callie,
I-I want you to know, the entire time
translation.it: Callie, voglio che tu sappia che il periodo in cui ho lavorato per te…

translation.en: that I was working for you, it sucked.
translation.it: Callie, voglio che tu sappia che il periodo in cui ho lavorato per te… ha fatto schifo.

translation.en: It was the absolute worst. You know, I-I was cold, I was tired,
translation.it: È stato un incubo. Avevo freddo, ero stanco

translation.en: and I smelled like a cow's ass the entire time.
translation.it: e puzzavo sempre come il culo di una mucca.

translation.en: Yeah, I remember that part.
But it was the best time of my life.
translation.it: Ma non sono mai stato più felice.

translation.en: And I'd give anything to go back to that.
translation.it: E darei qualsiasi cosa per riviverlo.

translation.en: Well, your position has been filled.
translation.it: Beh… il posto è già assegnato.

translation.en: Yeah, we got a new ranch hand.
translation.it: Sì, abbiamo un nuovo rancher. È anche bravo.

translation.en: He's good, too. Experienced.
translation.it: Sì, abbiamo un nuovo rancher. È anche bravo. Ha esperienza.

translation.en: Okay.
But...
I might be able to figure out something for you to do.
translation.it: forse potrei trovare qualcos'altro da farti fare.

translation.en: Well, I would need meals this time.
Oh, yeah. No.
Meals are not usually included.
translation.it: I pasti di solito non sono inclusi.

translation.en: And I would need a place to sleep.
translation.it: E di un posto dove dormire.

translation.en: I think I can swing that.
And you.
That was so sweet.
That was... So sweet.
I thought you were long overdue.
